body:
Comment 1: 
I get the same error from

package main

func main() {
	asdkfjalkj !true {
	}
}

I don't think it's going to be worthwhile to look at identifiers and try to see if they
might be keywords.  There are too many possibilities, and I think the results will be
too confusing.

Can you suggest a better error message for my example?  That is, where we don't try to
recognize that the person might have been trying to type "if"?
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**, **release-none**._
